sense.def:
To recommend something to someone
pomeni nekomu predlagati, da bi moral imeti ali uporabljati določeno stvar, ker je dobra in uporabna.

seg.quote: ...a fine novel which I'd strongly recommend.
Perhaps you could recommend me a solicitor.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REPORT VB

sense.def:
To recommend an action
pomeni predlagati, naj se neko dejanje izvaja.

seg.quote: The Harveys do not recommend other couples to have families of this size.
Mr Tebbit recommends cycling as a good form of exercise.
The Committee recommended that shareholders should vote against the offer.
